Leo A. Celi
Roger Mark
dcterms:description: The Medical Information Mart for Intensive Care (MIMIC-IV) is a single-center dataset encompassing information about over 40k patients admitted to intensive care units (ICUs) at the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center (BIDMC). This dataset includes a comprehensive range of data such as medications, laboratory measurements, observations, vital signs, care provider notes, procedure codes, fluid balance, diagnostic codes, hospital length of stay, imaging reports, survival data, and more.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-IV

dcterms:creator: Alistair Johnson
Tom Pollard
Steven Horng
Leo A. Celi
Roger Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-IV-Note offers deidentified free-text clinical notes for patients included in the MIMIC-IV clinical database. It contains over 331k discharge summaries and over 2 million radiology reports, providing context to the clinical data within MIMIC-IV.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-IV-Note
